Terms & Conditions for Job Assistance from PW Skills (India)


This program offers Job Assistance to participants subjected to specific terms and conditions mentioned below. If you disagree with our terms & conditions, you will not be applicable for the Job Assistance. The materials are secured by relevant copyright and trademark law. (Re-distributing or re-selling without permission is an offense that can lead to strict legal action)


  1. Candidates must be eligible to work in India per the Government of India guidelines.
  2. Remote Internship, provided by PW Skills, is mandatory for every candidate in the Job Assistance program. After completing the projects/internship, Job Assistance will apply to the candidate.
  3. Candidates must complete at least 60% of the given assignments/projects/etc. In the program, they are issued grades in assignments/projects/etc. It should be >=60% to avail of the Job Assistance.
  4. We provide a Job Assistance, given that the candidate ensures that all required Program assignments and submissions are completed within the stipulated period (9 months from the end date).
  5. Grades will be calculated based on the following:
    • Assignment Submission
    • Projects Submission
    • Internship Completion
  6. Kindly ensure that no plagiarism is found in any assignments/projects. It will make the submissions invalid, after which the candidate will be subjected to resubmitting.
  7. Candidates can avail themselves of facilities such as interview preparation & resume preparation only if they follow the instructions above.
  8. Candidates are supposed to complete their internship projects to apply for the opportunities provided to them as part of the Job Assistance program. Failure to complete the internship/projects will result in candidates not getting interview opportunities.
  9. There should be at most two years of career gap in the candidate's profile.
  10. PW Skills will refer the candidates to companies for interviews only with the candidate's prior consent, in any case, if the candidate is unwilling or fails to attend the interview. They will not be applicable to claim the refund, and PW Skills will have all the rights to deny any other interview opportunity.
  11. PW Skills will refer you to various product-based, service-based, or startup companies.
  12. After ensuring the Job, you are supposed to pass all the background verification as prescribed by the employer; in case of any lapse in verification, PW Skills holds no responsibility.
